subject: Can't Compile the MathTest
msgSnippet: I can t compile the MathTest.java given in the Cookbook.  The java compiler looks for the TestCase class which i think is present in the junit.jar.  I try to
messageBody:
I can't compile the MathTest.java given in the Cookbook. The java
compiler looks for the TestCase class which i think is present in the
junit.jar. I try to compile the MathTest.java with the following
line: c:\Projects\junit3.7\MathTest>javac -classpath
c:\Projects\junit3.7\junit.jar MathTest.java
The c:\Projects\junit3.7 is the install directory of my junit. The
java compiler couldn't find the TestCase class. Is there a way to
fix this problem.
